info.author: Michael Kluge
info.paperDescription: RNA-seq reads were mapped against the XXX genome using ContextMap (%SOFTWARE_VERSION%) with BWA as short read aligner and default parameters.

param.name: jarPath
param.description: path to ContextMap jar file

param.name: reads
param.description: path to reads in fasta or fastq format

param.name: alignerName
param.description: name of short-read alignment tool; supported values: 'bwa', 'bowtie1' or 'bowtie2'

param.name: alignerBin
param.description: path to the executable of the chosen aligner tool

param.name: indexerBin
param.description: path to the executable of the aligner's indexing tool (not needed for BWA)

param.name: indices
param.description: comma separated list of paths to basenames of indices, which can be used by the chosen aligner

param.name: genome
param.description: path to a directory with genome sequences in fasta format (each chromosome in a separate file)

param.name: output
param.description: path to the output directory

param.name: skipsplit
param.description: comma separated list of booleans, each element refers to a given aligner index (same ordering); 'true' for no split detection, 'false' otherwise (req. in mining mode).

param.name: skipmultisplit
param.description: comma separated list of booleans, each element refers to a given aligner index (same ordering); 'true' for no multisplit detection, 'false' otherwise (req. in mining mode).

param.name: speciesindex
param.description: path to a directory containing index files created with the 'indexer' tool (req. in mining mode)

param.name: alignerTmp
param.description: path to a directory for temporary alignment files

param.name: seed
param.description: seed length for the alignment (default: Bwt1: 30, BWA/Bwt2: 20)

param.name: splitseedsizes
param.description: seed size for the split search seed (default: 15)

param.name: mismatches
param.description: allowed mismatches in the whole read

param.name: seedmismatches
param.description: allowed mismatches in the seed region (default: Bwt1: 1, BWA/Bwt2: 0)

param.name: splitseedmismatches
param.description: allowed mismatches for the split seed search (default: 0)

param.name: mmdiff
param.description: maximum allowed mismatch difference between the best and second best alignment of the same read

param.name: maxhits
param.description: maximum number of candidate alignments per read; reads with more hits are skipped (bwa/bwt1) or the already found hits are reported (bwt2) (default for bwa/bwt1:10, bwt2: 3)

param.name: minsize
param.description: minimum number of reads a genomic region has to contain for being regarded as a local context

param.name: maxindelsize
param.description: maximum allowed size of insertions or deletions (default: 10)

param.name: gtf
param.description: path to an annotation file in gtf format

param.name: threads
param.description: number of threads used for mapping

param.name: localTmpFolder
param.description: path to a local storage that is used for temporary data

param.name: mining
param.description: enables the mining for infections or contaminations

param.name: noclipping
param.description: disables the calculation of clipped alignments

param.name: noncanonicaljunctions
param.description: enables the prediction of non-canonical splice sites

param.name: strandspecific
param.description: enables strand specific mapping

param.name: pairedend
param.description: enables mapping of paired-end reads; nomenclature for mates from the same fragment: base_name/1 and base_name/2, respectively; only valid for versions smaller than 2.7.2

param.name: polyA
param.description: enables the search for polyA-tails (mutually exclusive with --noclipping)

param.name: verbose
param.description: verbose mode

param.name: keeptmp
param.description: does not delete some temporary files

param.name: sequenceDB
param.description: sequence mapping to disk; recommended for very large data sets.

param.name: memoryScaleFactor
param.description: scale factor in percent that defines the proportion of the memory that is used for java; default memory: 3GB*threads*(scaleFactor/100)

param.name: memoryPerThread
param.description: total memory per thread in MB if running on local host; otherwise memory limit of Watchdog executor might be set; default: 3072
